name: When the Bough Breaks
description:
# Cradle Will Rock

Shadowrunners are used to handling valuable packages, but one that needs to be fed every few hours or it screams uncontrollably is a new one. This is not just an ordinary baby, though, and lots of people would like to take care of it—though their definitions of “take care” come with varying degrees of menace. The runners will have to maneuver the Neo-Tokyo scene carefully to protect all of the lives involved, including their own.
